column5: You come from a good part of the country, Sturgeon Falls is where my mom was born and raised. I fire mine up in the garage and cover it with a slightly larger metal cover . Cheers.
Say what... okay.. I clicked in..  .. you do know you can post a reply...to TJ's reply.. to your thread on smoking and you don't have to start a new one...
are we talking about some kind of metal bong?
OK..   i was a bit confused too.. fishing god... lol....   bong... lol...    its too cold out to smoke....
mykester.....i just got home from a turtle rodeo ....ive got to tell ya ...the action was slow
thought he was talking to me  for half a second
